comments:
Description: NullPointerException is thrown out when deleting a list group.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Save attached design file as a new file.
2. Right click on list group header and select "delete group". NullPointerException is thrown out.
ava.lang.NullPointerException

Filter delete event except for parmater/parameter group.
For that parmaeter/parameter group case, we need the event to clear the configure variable.
For other case, we don't need that delete event be fired to deleted elements.
That causes this bug.

Fixed. Now ElementDeletedEvent is send only if the deleted content is instance
of Parameter, ParameterGroup and DataSet.

It still throws out NullPointerException in build 20051215.

The first exception is fix by model.
After model changes, GUI don't change the logic according. That causes the new exception.
Change GUI code to adopt new model event sequence.
